Greetings all, my attempt at what seems to be a weekly tsuba kantei I have going with myself. 

Is this an Akasaka guard ?.

http://img47.ac.yahoo.co.jp/users/0/3/6/2/misschiwawa-img600x450-1071034482ko_653b.jpg

The Hitsu-ana don't look correct for any of the main schools, at least I can't remember seeing Akasaka with Kogai Hitsu-ana on both sides. The ones I have seen have either a Kogai Hitsu-ana or Kozuka Hitsu-ana on one side and a Hitsu-ana that is part of the shape of the overall design for the opposing Hitsu-ana or, they have the standard configuration or both Kozuka Hitsu-ana in a more rounded form.

Also, the seppa dai looks a little uniform to me and may be right for one of the later works but not the early stuff. 

I was wondering if this may be a Hayashi guard ???.

cheers all

Rich
